statements: SELECT * FROM Blog_posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM Blog_posts WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT post_id, title, created_at FROM Blog_posts WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Blog_posts WHERE author_id = 1 AND created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT post_id, title, author_id FROM Blog_posts WHERE content LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT title, content FROM Blog_posts WHERE author_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Blog_posts WHERE post_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT title, author_id FROM Blog_posts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT title, content, created_at FROM Blog_posts WHERE author_id = 3 AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Blog_posts WHERE title LIKE '%database%'
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM BlogPosts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT post_title, created_at FROM BlogPosts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM BlogPosts WHERE post_id IN (3, 4, 5);
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BlogPosts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_title FROM BlogPosts WHERE post_id = 2;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM BlogPosts WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM BlogPosts JOIN Categories ON BlogPosts.post_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT title, author_id FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT author_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY author_id;
SELECT name, bio FROM authors WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT post_id, content, created_at FROM comments WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, title, author_id FROM posts WHERE post_id = 10 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT p.title, a.name FROM posts p JOIN authors a ON p.author_id = a.author_id;
SELECT author_id, COUNT(*) AS num_posts FROM posts GROUP BY author_id HAVING num_posts > 2;
SELECT title, content, created_at FROM posts WHERE author_id = 1 AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT title, content, author_id FROM Posts WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT post_id, title, created_at FROM Posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT author_name, email FROM Authors WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT tag_name FROM Tags WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, title, content FROM Posts ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT title, author_id FROM Posts WHERE content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT author_name, email FROM Authors ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT post_id, tag_name FROM Posts JOIN PostTags ON Posts.post_id = PostTags.post_id JOIN Tags ON PostTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id;
SELECT author_name, email FROM Authors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY author_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Posts;
SELECT title, content, author FROM Posts WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT post_id, title, created_at FROM Posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_id, title, author FROM Posts WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, title, category_name FROM Posts JOIN PostCategories ON Posts.post_id = PostCategories.post_id JOIN Categories ON PostCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT title, content, author, created_at FROM Posts WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT post_id, title, content, author FROM Posts WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT post_id, title, category_name FROM Posts JOIN PostCategories ON Posts.post_id = PostCategories.post_id JOIN Categories ON PostCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Technology'
SELECT title, tag_name FROM Posts JOIN PostTags ON Posts.post_id = PostTags.post_id JOIN Tags ON PostTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%'

SELECT post_id, category_name, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM PostCategories JOIN Categories ON PostCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING post_count > 5 ORDER BY post_count DESC
